definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: incite, impel (NH id.; Ar. nadaba call impel, incite (naduba be noble, willing, generous is denom. fr. [nadbun cf.] [[נׇדִיב]] acc. to Ba:NB § 125 e); VIII. ndb ready, willing;As nidbu, freewill-offering Dl:HWB 448; Aram. [[נְדַב]] be willing Pa. Ithpa.; Zinj. [[נדב]] inciting, instigation DHM:Sendsch. 60);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נׇדַב]] Ex 35:29; 3 fs. [[נׇֽדְבָה]] v:Ex 35:21; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יִדְּבֶנּוּ]] Ex 25:2; —[[אֲשֶׁר נׇדַב לִבּוֹ]] Ex 25:2 whose heart incited cf. Ex 35:29; subj. [[רוּחַ]] Ex 35:21 (all P).
volunteer for war Ju Jdg 5:2, Jdg 5:9; for service of other kinds 2Ch 17:16, Ne 11:2.
offer freewill-offerings for the first temple 1Ch 29:5, 1Ch 29:6, 1Ch 29:9, 1Ch 29:9, 1Ch 29:14, 1Ch 29:17, 1Ch 29:17; for the second Ezr 1:4, Ezr 2:68, Ezr 3:5 (cf. BAram.).
